attributes.title: No ❤️
attributes.review:
As a member of the Trumpet cult, I was really hoping to support my everloving president Bunker Boy but the app took a good 2 days to download smh 🤦‍♀️ also his app is rude because it promotes his racist islamaphobic anti lgbt agenda and we do not like it. once the app was downloaded it wanted me to give them my number which i don’t want to do because i may be desperate but not that desperate and besides why should i have to give them my phone number in order to support our grateful president. trumpie has my full support but his app is not good. once i opened it it sent a bunch of killer stuffed animals after me which is just rude. trumpie boi you are low on support right now so you really shouldn’t attack the few friends you have. anyways i love daddy donald for handling COVID in the worst possible way. and we have to stan him putting children in cages and not doing anything about ICE losing like 3000 kids. and yeah he has 25+ s3xual ass*ult allegations but we have to ignore those because everyone makes mistakes. although i stan him, i also think Daddy Donald needs to have his thumbs taped together otherwise he’s gonna keep messing up his life. and it’s also in his best interest to not say things like “if ivanka weren’t my daughter perhaps i’d be dating her” and telling people that the kidney is located in the heart. of course i’m only saying this because i only want the best for my glorious president. anyways the app is awful so don’t get it unless you want an army of killer stuffed animals unleashed on you ❤️ 

The 🦠kidney 🧬has a very💫 special✨ place 🪐in the heart❤️it’s an incredible😍 thing

trump 2020 🇱🇷🇱🇷🇱🇷
